TwitchToolkit.Command.label: viewer class
TwitchToolkit.Command.description: Shows information about your current RimWorld of Magic class. This command will only be usable when RimWorld of Magic is installed.

TwitchToolkit.Command.label: ability level
TwitchToolkit.Command.description: Allows viewers to assign points to their RimWorld of Magic class abilities. This command will only be usable when RimWorld of Magic is installed.
